title: Welcome To Miami
abstract: Miami is a world-famous destination, known for its stunning beaches, diverse culture, and vibrant nightlife. Whether you're looking for relaxation by the ocean, adventures in the Everglades, or high-end shopping, Miami offers an unparalleled experience year-round.

services.title: Accommodations
services.intro: From luxurious resorts to cozy budget options, Miami has something for every traveler.
list: The Biltmore Hotel: Historic charm with a world-class golf course and fine dining.
The Standard, Miami Beach: A boutique hotel offering spa treatments and serene waterfront views.
W South Beach: A modern resort with a vibrant pool scene and direct beach access.

services.title: Transportation
services.intro: Efficient options for getting around Miami, from public transit to ride-sharing.
list: Metrorail: Miami's elevated train system for navigating the city efficiently.
Uber: A convenient way to explore Miami with just a few taps on your phone.
Brightline: High-speed train service connecting Miami to nearby cities.

services.title: Dining
services.intro: Miami offers an exciting food scene, featuring flavors from around the world.
list: Stubborn Seed: A Michelin-star restaurant offering creative New American cuisine.
Lung Yai Thai Tapas: A small, bustling spot for authentic Thai street food.
La Mar by Gast√≥n Acurio: A stunning waterfront restaurant serving Peruvian fusion cuisine.

services.title: Shopping
services.intro: Indulge in Miami's finest shopping experiences, from luxury boutiques to local markets.
list: Design District: High-end shopping with galleries, art installations, and trendy cafes.
Wynwood Marketplace: A lively outdoor market offering unique finds and handmade goods.
Dadeland Mall: A popular shopping destination with a mix of upscale and mainstream retailers.

packages.title: Little Havana Food and Walking Tour
packages.description: Dive into the vibrant Cuban culture of Little Havana with a guided food tour. Sample authentic Cuban dishes, visit cultural landmarks, and meet the local artisans that make this neighborhood unique.

packages.title: Everglades Airboat Adventure
packages.description: Discover the beauty of the Everglades on a thrilling airboat ride through the 'River of Grass.' Spot alligators, exotic birds, and other wildlife in their natural habitat.

packages.title: Biscayne Bay Jet Ski Tour
packages.description: Cruise along Biscayne Bay on a jet ski while taking in views of Miami's skyline and celebrity homes. Perfect for thrill-seekers looking to explore Miami from the water.

packages.title: Art Deco Architecture Tour in South Beach
packages.description: Explore the iconic Art Deco district of South Beach with an expert guide. Learn about the history and design of Miami's famous pastel-colored buildings.

packages.title: Miami Helicopter Tour
packages.description: See Miami from a new perspective with an exhilarating helicopter ride. Fly over downtown, the beaches, and landmarks like the American Airlines Arena.

packages.title: Wynwood Walls Graffiti Tour
packages.description: Walk through Wynwood, Miami's famous street art district. Admire large-scale murals and learn about the artists who transformed this neighborhood into an outdoor gallery.
